# getFlags | Apple Developer Documentation

-  getFlags 

Instance Method# getFlags

DriverKit 19.0+macOS

```
uint32_t getFlags();
```

## [Return Value](/documentation/hiddriverkit/iohidelement/getflags#return-value)

Returns the element’s flags. Flags are defined in the IOHIDElementFlags enumerator in - [`IOHIDElementFlags`](/documentation/hiddriverkit/iohidelementflags).
